sentences.sContent: Coffee slopped over the rim of her cup.
sentences.sCn: 咖啡从她的杯口溢了出来。

sentences.sContent: With each wave, more water slopped into the cabin.
sentences.sCn: 随着一个个浪头打来，更多的水漫进了船舱。

words.tran: 倾斜的；有坡度的；成斜坡的

trans.tranOther: if liquid slops somewhere, it moves around or over the edge of a container in an uncontrolled way
